project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions.

task.name: Implement the function to fetch weather data from the public API
Parse the JSON response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement the feature to input the city name from the user
Format and display the weather information in the terminal
Write tests to ensure that data fetching, parsing, and display functions work correctly
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
